snippet.title: Heart of the Machine| DevTALK
snippet.description:
Heart of the Machine lets you become the first machine that is self-aware.
In terms of how you play it, it is so fresh and in-depth and complex, that is actually hard to put in words. If you have an idea of how to summarise it in a few words, pls let me know in the comments.
Enjoy a view behind the curtains and gasp upon an amazing future project!

Game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2001070/Heart_of_the_Machine/
-----------------------
Are you enjoying the content? Pls, consider subscribing, leaving thumb-ups and comments.
Helps a lot, thank you!
